procedure.title: How conditional rewriting works
procedure.para: The following procedure summarizes how conditional rewrite rules (rewrite rules that have the condition() parameter set) work. The following configuration snippet is used to illustrate the procedure:

step.para: The log path receives a message from the source (s1).

The rewrite rule (r_rewrite_set) evaluates the condition. If the message matches the condition (the PROGRAM field of the message is "myapplication"), &abbrev; rewrites the log message (sets the value of the HOST field to "myhost"), otherwise it is not modified.
The next element of the log path processes the message (d1).
